lines: We praise thee, O God, for the Son of thy love,-
For Jesus who and is now gone above.
We praise thee, O God, for thy Spirit of light,
Who has shown us our Saviour, and scatter`d our night.
All glory to the Lamb that was slain,
Who has borne all our sins, and has cleansed ev`ey stain.
All glory and praise to then God of all grace,
Who has brought us and sought us, and guided our ways.
Revive us again; fill each heart with thy love;
May each soul be re kindled with fire from above?
